item.title: Trouble with Windows Live Messenger
item.dc:creator: Hang
item.description: I’ve been having trouble in launching Windows Live Messenger for quite some time and I had to use Pidgin to connect to my MSN buddies, finally (today) I decided to solve this problem and here is the quick solution: http://www.truecombatelite.com/forums/viewtopic.php?p=26227&sid=d7f42bc042a2595f68b3ec3b98f08262 I’ve tried and it works perfectly – after deleting the registry key under group HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Microsoft\MSNMessenger\PerPassportSettings, [...]
item.content:encoded:
I’ve been having trouble in launching Windows Live Messenger for quite some time and I had to use Pidgin to connect to my MSN buddies, finally (today) I decided to solve this problem and here is the quick solution:

http://www.truecombatelite.com/forums/viewtopic.php?p=26227&sid=d7f42bc042a2595f68b3ec3b98f08262

I’ve tried and it works perfectly – after deleting the registry key under group HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Microsoft\MSNMessenger\PerPassportSettings, my Windows Live Messenger came back to work.

I haven’t read through though, not sure what’s the story beind.
